New Records: New Zealand recorded 401 for six, the highest total at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium.
Key Match Events: Fakhar Zaman scored a swashbuckling century (126 n.o., 81b, 8x4, 11x6) to help Pakistan defeat New Zealand by 21 runs (DLS method).
Babar Azam contributed a steady half-century (66 n.o., 63b, 6x4, 2x6).
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was interrupted by rain three times.
Rain stopped play with Pakistan at 160 for one in their chase of 402 runs.
